page.title: 06FAMOUS WESTERHAM PEOPLE
page.content: {General Wolfe}was born in the vicarage. He fought in the Battle of Quebec and lived in Quebec House. He was famous and there is a statue of him on the Green. {The Warde Family}have lived in Squerryes Court for over 200 years. Mr.Warde farms much of the nearby land and is one of our school's governors. {Sir Winston Churchill}lived at Chartwell. There is a statue of him on the Green.It was given by President Tito of Yugoslavia for all his help in the war. On Westerham Gala Day,Sir Winston used to watch the procession and give some of the prizes. Most of his grandchildren were christened in St.Mary's church.
